title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Online Medical Terminology Utilization Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and experience in organization/system management
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 90% accuracy when writing patient records and reports using medical terminology.

In a 2-week scenario-based practical assignment (2 sessions/week, 4 total), learners will accurately use ≥16/20 medical terminology checklist items, demonstrating expert-level communication skills with ≥4/5 points on the evaluation rubric.
Learners achieve over 85% appropriateness in using contextually accurate medical terminology through peer assessment.
Learners confirm a 20% or greater increase in self-efficacy for terminology application via a self-assessment survey at the course's conclusion.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
